alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 27 at 2:59PM EST until November 27 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EST FOR SOUTHWESTERN INDIANA...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND NORTH CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 258 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Pleasant, or 7 miles south of Greensburg, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Jeannette, Latrobe, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, Youngwood, Derry, Lawson Heights, New Stanton, and Ligonier. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
